title: International promotion of the North Wyke Farm Platform
impactText: Provided increased global awareness of the North Wyke Farm Platform Agriculture, Food and Drink Societal
findingsText: This grant led to the development of a Memorandum of Understanding between North Wyke and Massey University (NZ) that has already see one long-term visit from a NZ scientist to North Wyke The MoU should encourage further exchange of researchers between the two organisations, focussed around the North Wyke Farm Platform Agriculture, Food and Drink
